title: My mom died last month and my dad and I are trying to save her pics/vids. We do not have her code.
content: I've contact google and they can't help do anything. ive submitted access to a deceased loved ones data. nothing. we dont have her code to unlock her phone. i am willing to do anything at this point. we have to send the phone back to Verizon or we'll be charged $500 for the remaining balance on it.
